scripts.build: npm run prepare-build & npm run build-client & npm run build-server & npm run clean-prev-build & npm run export-build
scripts.prepare-build: npx mkdirp ../builds-tiro & npx mkdirp ../builds-tiro/client & npx mkdirp ../builds-tiro/server
scripts.build-client: cd client & npm i &  rm -r ./build & npm run build
scripts.build-server: cd shared &  npm i & cd ../server & npm i & rm -r ./build & npm run build
scripts.clean-prev-build: npm run clean-server & npm run clean-client & npm run clean-else
scripts.export-build: npm run export-client & npm run export-binaries & npm run export-config & npm run export-scripts & npm run export-server
scripts.launchAppDev: npm run startServerNewCmd & npm run client
